document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">There </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">two </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Ripenings </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">One </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Sight </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#fff8ae">Forces </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">spheric </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">round </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Until </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Velvet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Product </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Drop, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">spicy, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Ground </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Homelier </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">maturing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Process </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Bur </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Teeth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Frosts, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">alone </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">disclose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">still </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">October </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Air </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: There are two ripenings
